title: Ticket #2791: A multicore machine that is always running >0 jobs disables PREEN
description: Originally reported by a Windows user, but the problem is more general. As multi-core machines become more commmon, it becomes increasinly likely that a given machine will always have at least 1 slot in the CLAIMED or PREEMPTING state. This essentially disables condor_preen, since if it detects a slot in one of those states, it will assume that all execute subdirectories are in use and will not clean up any of them.
remarks:
2012-Jan-26 10:00:16 by tstclair:
Well... preen should only have to cleanup for jobs that failed to cleanup for whatever reason.
